casebody.data:
2002-2461 (La. 10/4/02)

PLANT FAB, INC. and Gary Ventrella v. UNIROYAL CHEMICAL COMPANY, INC., Deltech Corporation, U.S. Comex Corporation, Safeway Transportation, Inc., and TMI Enterprises, Inc. No. 2002-CC-2461. Supreme Court of Louisiana. Oct. 4, 2002.

In re Uniroyal Chemical Company, Inc.; — Defendant; Applying for Supervisory and/or Remedial Writs, Parish of W. Baton Rouge, 18th Judicial District Court Div. C, No. 26,042; to the Court of Appeal, First Circuit, No. 2002 CW 2043.

Denied.

TRAYLOR, J., would grant the writ.
